email_body:
You appear to be using an email application that won't properly display the graphical (or HTML) version of our newsletter. Because we want you to enjoy reading QuickTime News, we recommend that you visit the following site and switch to the plain text version of this newsletter:

    http://www.apple.com/enews/change/

If you have trouble reading today's issue of QuickTime News, please consider visiting the following web page where it has been posted for your enjoyment:

    http://www.apple.com/enews/currentqissue/
    
If you receive a blank message with an enclosure, drag the enclosure into the window of your web browser and today's issue of QuickTime News will display in your web browser.

Thank you.
